title: Installing doors and windows
brief_description: Carpenter Tom Law demonstrates his methods for installing doors and windows using easy to follow techniques and hints that he has developed over 26 years. You will be instructed on the installation of various doors and windows, each requiring different skills that you will build on and develop with each application. Among the skills are squaring and securing an opening window, building and installing a jamb, hanging and adjusting a door.
